## Discussion

The version number you provide here represents the minimum Apple Pay version that the user’s browser must support. You can check which API version the browser supports by calling [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/supportsVersion].

# version

**Instance Property**

The Apple Pay version supported on your website.

## Declaration

```swift
required long version;
```

## Discussion

The version number you provide here represents the minimum Apple Pay version that the user’s browser must support. You can check which API version the browser supports by calling [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/supportsVersion].

Always check [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/supportsVersion] before using an Apple Pay feature that isn’t available in all versions. See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/apple-pay-on-the-web-version-history] for information about the features available in each version.

## Identifier and version information

- **merchantIdentifier**: The merchant identifier you registered with Apple for use with Apple Pay.

items.description: The merchant identifier you registered with Apple for use with Apple Pay.
